ygData.subject: RE: Introduction
ygData.msgSnippet: It s opened but only wiz got plane spell to go there.  I heard normal gate no longer works to get in AND out of other planes, true? On top of that, only those
ygData.messageBody:
It's opened but only wiz got plane spell to go there. I heard normal gate
no longer works to get in AND out of other planes, true?

On top of that, only those lvl 46 and above can tag along to the plane.
Thou druid get teleport spell 1 lvl b4 wiz, but they dun have spell to
alternate planes or EQ future expansion lands. Tat's why wiz can easily
charge 100pp per gate to planes, hehe. At lvl 46, 100pp is cheap I think
;) Ask that chao ah-qua how much he got in his lvl 49 enchanter bank,
hehe. Eg, I heard SG give 50pp loot, lvl 40 enchanter can hunt SG for 8
hrs and just imagine the income ;-).....

Ziltus

On Monday, 30 August, 1999 10:18 AM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> Only person able to hunt at PoF. Not necessary means can go into PoF.
> btw, PoH is open liao. but duno where or how to get there. Plane of Hate
